about.title: About Hobby Nest
about.appDescription: HobbyNest is a private web application designed for individuals who enjoy recording their past experiences and tracking the things they love. Whether you’re a fan of series, movies, games, books, or even have a cherished recipe, HobbyNest allows you to create and manage personal collections that capture your journey through ratings, reflections, and to-do lists. By sharing these collections with friends, you also spark inspiration and engaging conversations about shared passions.
about.motivation: HobbyNest was born out of a desire to help people preserve memories and celebrate what truly matters—the hobbies and experiences that define us. As an innovative solution developed during my Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science, this project is both a technical challenge and a personal passion. It provides a creative platform where users can keep a record of their favorite pastimes while building a community that celebrates common interests and ignites meaningful interactions.
about.creditsMessage: We gratefully acknowledge the following open databases and resources that make this application possible:

login.description: Create and share collections of your favorite movies, series, and more with your friends. Discover new content and get recommendations based on your interests.
